title: Age of Mythology + Expansion- Widescreen-Direct Play [Win+Lin]
description:
Welcoming myself back after a long few months. 

This is COMPLETE Age of Mythology, which includes the expansion as well. 

I have tweaked it to work on modern widescreen monitors, the resolution is 1920*1080. 

It is also Direct Play which means you don't need to install anything!

*Download

*Extract

*For Windows users, go to the extracted folder and double click on aom.exe or aoms.exe

*For Linux users, go to the extracted folder and right click on aom.exe or aoms.exe and select Open With WINE Windows Program Loader. (Wine needs to be installed previously)

Like my Other releases, this game is fully tested on 

I. Windows 10
II. Linux Mint 18.04

Enjoy the game, and don't forget to say Thanks, means a lot to me. 

Finally, PLEASE SEED, let all enjoy the game
